Pre-Game Insights: The Twins are favored on the money line (-153)
Nick Martinez will go for the Reds, while the Twins are sending Simeon Woods Richardson to the mound
The over/under line is currently 8.5 runs, and the under is favored at -119
The Reds cruised to an easy 8-4 win over the Twins in the most recent game of this series, with six of their eight runs scored in the 7th inning
The Twins scored four of their four runs in the 5th inning of the most recent game
Julian Aguiar pitched well for the Reds, going 6 1/3 innings and giving up just three hits and three earned runs
Bailey Ober struggled on the mound for the Twins, giving up five earned runs in 6 1/3 innings of work
TJ Friedl and Elly De La Cruz each homered for the Reds, while Spencer Steer scored twice and drove in two runs
Jonathan India also had a two-hit game and scored a run
